item.title: Autumn add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Autumn add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "If I let you get killed, the other body guards will make fun of me." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Autumn add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "A ghra. A amhain. My love. My only." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Autumn add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Autumn add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
Autumn add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
item.description: "Accept me or kill me MacKayla. But choose. Fucking Choose." -- Karen Marie Moning
